I wish everyone a safe travel from Cairo International Airport, some tips for travelers:
1 - Baggage gates open three hours before take-off.
2- The aircraft gates close 25 minutes before take-off.
3 - Do not leave your bags far from you, as this exposes you to legal accountability.
4 - Before entering the plane, you will be searched personally, and you will also take off your shoes and coat to pass through the electronic detection devices, so do not be disturbed by that.
5 - Water bottles will be taken before boarding the plane.
bon voyage everyone,

Cairo International Airport contains 4 terminals.

Terminal 1 contains 3 halls for arrivals and departures.

Terminal 2 contains 2 halls for arrivals and departures.

Terminal 3 contains 2 halls for arrivals and departures.

Terminal 4 (Occasional flights terminal) for Hajj and Omrah flights only.

Cairo Airport has huge area for cars parking and also has 3 hotels 5 stars hotel and 4 stars hotels inside the airport.

There are many shuttles buses between all airport terminals and an electric train for free.

This place is very safe and clean.

But in terms of treatment and ease of procedures, it lacks a lot

Aber in Bezug auf die Behandlung und die Einfachheit der Verfahren fehlt es an viel
